creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
If the "Authorization" header is set with a different method than "Basic", the
username and password request parameters are not evaluated. The problem lies in
the UserAuthenticator class.

Created attachment 21101
Patch for UserAuthenticator

The patched version considers the header only if the Authorization is "Basic".
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 21104
Patch for UserAuthenticator

Updated the last patch (didn't work for digest authorization either)
